case.state: I see that the outside world isn't that different from home...
There are monsters here, too! I feel right at home!
Strip poker? Is that something humans play for fun?

Is this something humans do for fun?

Zombie? You look just like a human, Saki!
That's a pretty light, but how is it gonna play?
Fight? I don't want trouble, Zizou!
Oh! I can't believe I thought your arms were like a mummy's. Heehee, silly me!
For some reason I thought the sun was gonna burn me...
Hey, look! This place isn't that different from the hotel!
This place isn't that different from the hotel! I like it!
Oh, it seems I'm not the only non-human here!
Oh, nevermind. I think ~player~'s the only human here!

Am I seeing this right? There are other vampires besides me!
I'd love to play!
I'll play with you!
I'll play too!
I can't wait to play with you!
Then I'd love to play!

(Should I say how good this hand is out loud...?)

I'll keep my bra... at least.

I could have used a hand like this, but it's good to have it now.

I'll be more lucky this round!

Ah, yes. This should be okay.

It'll work!
Not bad...

Sure...

Will I lose or not?
Is this good... or bad?

It's okay, maybe someone will have a worse hand!
One more loss and I'm out, right? (Maybe it won't be so bad after all...)
So, I'll have to...? (Not the worst way to lose...)

It's just bad luck, right?
I should've learned the rules better...
This sucks...
Can I get new cards? No...? Okay...
Aww, this is no good...
I'll see how this turns out...
I'm gonna... see how this one works out.

Aah! It's so bad it's almost scary.

Hrrng...
Hmmph...
I was just starting to get comfortable...
Maybe staying at home wasn't so bad after all...
Yeah... no.

So... I think I'll lose this one.

Urghh...

Aaah!
Well, at least this is way more entertaining than being alone at home...
Awful, just awful!
Oh... (It was great playing with you guys...!)
I-I guess I'm out after this one...
I... I think that's my last hand...
Am I gonna be out?
So... that's the last one, probably...
Witches, monsters and ghosts? They should have just called this place "Boo! Haunted House."
Ghosts, monsters and witches? This place should have been called "Boo! Haunted House."
Alter Ego? Okay, but how are you gonna play?
Alter Ego? That's fine but... how are you gonna play this game?
Well, it doesn't matter if you're a boy or a girl. You're still very cute, Chihiro!
But wait, what are you gonna shave now, Felicia?
But... what are you gonna shave now, Felicia?
Oh right! Sorry, Mae, I forgot...
She's awesome, Remilia! You're so lucky to have her looking after you!
Yes, Estelle! Wait, don't tell me, you're 118, too? That's awesome!
This is awesome! I'm so happy that a zombie can be a famous singer in the human world! Who knows, maybe vampires could be too!
Y-Your consort? She's your wife? B-But... you're a human, and she's a ghost!
I-It's not that uncomfortable, Mae. Just a little embarrassing...
I'm sure you'd look cute if you tried them on, Mae!
I-I'm not sure, Sakura... From what I know, we're not too different from humans, it's just that things happen faster for them...
I-I'm not really sure, Sakura... I guess we're not that different from humans. You're also very different from the zombies I know...
N-No, Tharja, I-I'm just...
I... I don't think so, Sakura...?
Daughters? Band? But I don't have any sisters, One...
Felicia, I love your hair! It's so vibrant!
You've brought your maid with you, Ms. Remilia?
S-Shaved? B-But I d-didn't...
Wait, he said humans were the ones that hated us, not angels. Why wouldn't he say anything about you, Pit?
N-No, Sei, I am floating... I'm a vampire, you know...
W-Why are you so flustered, Pit? I-Is it something I said?
D-did you say drink, Sei? (Was that just a joke at my expense, or did she actually mean it...?)
W-Well, Estelle, I-I... eh...
Oh! I-I guess that makes me feel less dumb...
W-Why are you blushing, Pit? I thought boys liked this... Or is it because I'm a vampire?
Aunt? Then you should visit us at the hotel! We'd love it if you came to stay!
Uh... s-sorry, Sakura...
Don't worry about that, Estelle. It's exciting for me!
Moon? I don't see anything, Jolyne...
Huh? I don't see any moon, Jolyne!
I was feeling kind of embarrassed, so that's so nice to hear, Sei! You're such a kind girl, I can't believe I was almost scared of humans!
Yeah, Misty, 93... I'm 118 years old, you know...
Eh... I... I don't think so, Sakura?
Thanks, Miko. I was getting a little self-conscious about my weight, but now I feel great!
Can you be honest? Is this outfit a bit too revealing?
I thought this game would be a lot more... private...
Look at the window! A full moon! So big!
Hey, look! It's a beautiful full moon tonight!
Look outside the window! A full moon! It's so beautiful!
Look! A full moon! It's so big!
Look! It's a beautiful full moon tonight!
Hey, look! A full moon! It's so beautiful!
Look! A full moon! So big!
Look! It's a beautiful full moon tonight!
Hey, look! A full moon! It's so beautiful!
You're probably wondering how I'm standing here in sunlight... yeah, me too.
Is this a good look on me?
Is this a good look on me?
Am I the only girl here? C-Could you go easy on me?
Am I the only girl? (Is this good luck, or bad luck...?)
Is this an all-girls night? Awesome!
An all-girls night? Great!
It's just girls? Wonderful!
Hi there! I'm Mavis, Dracula's daughter. Yeah, I know, everyone freaks out at first.
Wait... that's not what you usually do?
Is... that not what you usually take off first?
W-What? Isn't that what you take off first?
Ugh! My stockings are getting tight... I must be gaining weight from just staying at home...
Hmm! Ugh! My stockings are getting tighter. I must be gaining weight since I barely leave home...
Yes, I-I'm Dracula's daughter. I-Is there something wrong with that?
I... uh... I haven't, Ms. Remilia...
Huh? D-Don't worry, Ms. Remilia. I'd rather take off my clothes myself...
Huh? D-Don't worry, Miko. I wouldn't like if someone else took off my clothes...
That's right, Miko! I don't wanna be treated any different just because of who my dad is.
D-Diet? No, Alice! I don't do that!
I'd do it, Alice... if I knew who she was, heh...
C-Costume? N-No, Jura! I'm a real vampire!
Levitate? Oh! Right, heh... I forgot humans couldn't do that...
Eeh... a little bit, Nines. But don't worry! You two are still cute!
Human? Oh no, Nines, I'm not a human!
Yeah, Cammy, I am! This is just how I always dress...
I was, Chun. W-Why would I lie about something like that?
What's that, Misato? Oh, I just turned 118 years old!
Y-Yeah, Ping... i-is that too weird?
Shichib- uh? No, Nami, I'm a vampire!
Yes, Pit, I am. Why do you ask?
That's right, Sakura. But you said something about a band named like that, right? I wonder how they sound.. are they any good?
B-Biter? W-What do you mean by that, Sei?
Y-Yeah, Syrenne... what did you expect?
Thank you, Nami! I'm so glad you're not scared of me or anything!
That's so sweet, Sakura. But please, don't treat me any different just because of who my dad is!
Yes, Syrenne. Heh, I forget you humans can't do that...
H-Hey! He may be a bit hard-headed, Ping, but that doesn't mean he's evil!
Heh, believe me, Sakura, I will...
I may not know a lot about the outside world, Nines, but I do know what comes off next!
It's too bad the rules of the game say I need to take it off, heh. Right, Sei?
W-What do I do now...?
Hmm... no surprises here...
Sorry for taking so long, guys. Heehee...
I almost thought I wasn't gonna lose once! Heehee...
Not even I knew I was this good!
No problem! I'm winning, after all...
I'm okay with losing once...
Losing once isn't so bad.
Losing isn't so bad when I'm having fun!
Is this loss bad luck even if I'm winning?
I'm winning, soooo....
Since I'm winning, I think I'll give you a surprise...
You guys want me to take off something big since I'm winning, don't you? Well...
Now that I'm winning, my stockings would be the logical choice, wouldn't they?
I'll go easy now...
I think I'll slow down for this round...
Maybe taking off my dress wasn't the best idea...
I guess being at the top didn't matter in the end...
So having an advantage wasn't important at all...
I'm still winning, but I guess that's not important now...
So much for an advantage...
That was barely an advantage!
Now we'll all be naked together.
I'm out of surprises here...
Oh, well. I feel right at home, for some reason...
Oh, well. Thanks for making me feel at home, guys!
What should I take off first...?
My turn? I should take off...
Ah! I lost... I'll take off my...
Now what can I take off?
Oh! I lost...
Shoot!
I guess I've been playing it too safe...
I've been playing this too safely, haven't I?
My stockings would be the logical choice, wouldn't they?
Sorry, guys, no more surprises...
I-I think I'll strip normally now...
I-I'll go in a more decent order now...
Of course I know what to take off now!
Ah, yes. I know what's next.
Hey! Just because I don't know the outside world, doesn't mean I don't know what comes off next.
I suppose everyone knows what's coming next...
Alright, I guess you all know what's coming...
I'm down to my last item, sooooo...
Nothing I do now can be a surprise, can it?
M-Me first? It's okay, I just... hope I'm not the only one...
M-Me first? It's okay, I just... don't want to be the first to lose everything...
I-I go first? I-I just hope I don't lose it all first...
M-Me first? O-Okay, I just hope I don't lose too badly...
M-Me? Okay...
My turn? Fine...
Oh? My turn? Okay...
Oh... me again...
Again, huh?
I'm losing. So... there's no point in trying to stay decent...
I know I'm losing, so... I may as well have some fun...
I know I'm in last place, so I think I'll make that clear...
T-This is bad...
Oh gee...
Losing isn't so bad, because I'm having fun!
It's that time, right?
Oh... it's that part of the game...
Ah! We're at that part of the game...
I must look silly...
You must think I'm dumb, don't you?
Ugh... I'm such a dummy...
Well... there's only one choice left...
Blood? Oh! You mean my family name! I'm a Dracula, Ms. Remilia.
Remilia? No, Miko, my name is Mavis!
That's okay, Miko. This wouldn't be fun if someone else did it for me!
A photo? Yeah, I'd love to!
Come on, Auntie, what do you say?
I'm not an android or a human, Nines. I'm a vampire!
He may be a little hard-headed and dumb, but he's not evil!
Yes, and now that I'm older I'll try to go outside more!
No, Ping! Why would I want something like that?
Yes, I am! Y-You're not scared by that, are you?
M-My look?
That's just something vampires can do, Nami. You mean you know humans that can do it too?
Huh... I think so, Nines...
Halloween? T-This is how I always dress...
Well, it's not like this outfit covered much!
I was almost exposed with this outfit!
Here I go! These don't serve any purpose!
Well... these don't cover much anyway!
These boots are so tight...
Wait, my boots are tight...
I don't wanna take my leotard off just yet, so my leggings will do for now!
Even if this outfit is very revealing, I don't wanna be exposed just yet...
Oh right! I forgot about my earrings!
Lucky me! I can take my earrings off!
I think I'll go for my shoes now.
Shoes! That's it!
My shoes! Yeah, I'll go for that!
My shoes! That seems like a good choice!
Now I'll take off my dress!
Now off comes my dress!
I'll take off my dress!
I choose my dress!
Now I'll take off my stockings!
This time I'll take off my stockings.
The "underwear and stockings-only" look was oddly comfortable...
My panties!
My panties! Yeah, that's it!
W-Well here I go...
Y-You won't laugh, will you, ~player~?
D-Do you guys like how I look...?
Here I go!
~Clothing~! Here I go!
I'll go for my ~clothing~. It can't be too hard!
My ~clothing~. That's okay for my first loss, right?
~Clothing~! Got it.
You mean there's someone who pretended to be me, Miko? Why would they do that?
R-Really, Miko... you're making me blush...
I-I really don't think something like a family name is that important, ladies...
I'm starting to like this whole "Vampire Princess" thing!
"Queen of the Night?" I love that nickname!
Oh! Hehee! Thanks, Sakura. I'm just glad you don't think I'm bad or scary.
Oh! Hehee! Thanks, Sakura. I'm glad I'm not the only monster here...
There...! Wait! Did you say aunt, Remilia?
W-We would just not mention where we met, I guess...
Thank you! This is my first time in a place like this...
What's that, Cammy? Please don't tell me I'm scaring you, i-it's not my intention!
Yeah, Chun! He's not bad or anything, but sometimes I wish he would worry less about the outside world.
Of course not! Why do you think that, Leggy?
Like coming here! Do you think this is a good idea, Misato?
"Keep an eye on me?" Wait, do you really mean it, Ping? Because I've seen zombies that-
I can't believe it, Pit! You're so mean! I can't believe Dad was right about-
Heh, thank you so much, Sei! Could you believe some people are scared of me?
Don't worry about that, Tharja. This is fun!
Yay! I'm so glad you're not scared of me! Maybe we can be friends!
Floating? This is something vampires can do, Nines!
That's... really accurate. I'd be surprised that you know me so well, but I'm actually glad that you don't think I'm bad and scary!
Yes, we can turn into bats, but that doesn't have anything to do with our shoes! That's like if you thought we didn't need to wear clothes!
I'm sure you'd look very cute with them, Roxie!
Y-You think I'm pretty, Sakura...? Aww, you're making me blush!
Take over the world? (That would get boring after a while...) ...Why don't we just keep playing, Tharja?
Take over the world? (That would get boring after a while...) ...Why don't we just keep playing, Tharja?
Take over the world? (That would get boring after a while...) ...Why don't we just keep playing, Tharja?
There's lots of things that we can't do that you can! Like sunbathing...
Thank you, Estelle! It's a cute look, right?
That's right, Misty! We came here to have fun, so why be ashamed of ourselves?
S-Sunlight, Nami? N-No, thanks, I'm fine...
Diet? I don't really eat anything special, Sakura. Well, other than too many slices of Scream Pie...
Hey, Tharja! Of course I;m a vampire! (How could I lie about that...?)
I do, Cammy. Sometimes I forget that you humans can't do that, heh, sorry...
Oh, right! I forgot humans can't do it, sorry if it's weird for you, heh...
I'm sure they would, Estelle! You're a very pretty girl!
B-Boyfriend? I-I don't have one, Misty, but... aww, you made me blush.
Heh, thanks, Pit! Maybe you aren't as mean as I thought...
Oh, right! You're a singer, Sakura. I'd like to see one of your shows! Maybe one day...
Heh! Thanks, Tharja. I'm sure you would look pretty in them!
There! Wait... who's Tae-chan, Sakura?
Aww, I'm so glad you think that, Sakura! Who knows? Maybe I'll do this again soon!
Thank you, Tharja! You're so nice, that makes me feel so much better.
Don't worry, I'm taking all of them off.
Yeah, I'm not keeping all of them on...
Did they look good on me?
Oh my! My legs are all bare now!
Do I look nice? Be honest!
Hehe~ Sorry to disappoint you~
Sorry, hehe~ But they still count!
Ugh, this can be so uncomfortable!
Ugh! I hate the wedgie this outfit gives me!
And... the other one!
Here's the other one, let's keep playing!
And there's the other one. Now let's keep playing!
Happy now?
Is this better?
Do you like this more?
Did you like that look? I thought it was cute...
That was a cute look, wasn't it?
That look with my stockings on, wasn't it cute?
There! (Wait...)
Done! (Wait a minute...)
I'm ready! (...Something doesn't feel right...)
T-There! I'm all naked now!
T-There! I'm fully naked now!
W-Well, this is me...
This is fun!
They were right, this is fun!
This isn't so bad! I'm having fun!
This ain't so bad! It's even fun!
Don't be shy, ~name~. I don't bite!
Why haven't you said anything, ~name~? A-Am I scaring you?
(~Player~ is kind of cute, now that I think about it...)
(~Player~'s kind of cute...)
(I'm so lucky!)
~Player~ again? (Yes!)
Hehee... your turn!
Sorry! Maybe you'll do better next time!
Is it too weird to say that I like... this?
Would you like it if I said I like you... losing?
Would you like it if I said I liked... when you lose?
(There's something eerie about him, but what is it...?)
I-If you must...
(I definitely need to leave home more often...)
You've seen me naked already, ~player~... what are you going to take off?
Yay! It's ~player~'s turn!
Y-You lost, ~player~. But losing isn't that bad...
Y-You can still come back, ~player~...
Y-You still have a chance, ~player~!
Don't worry about losing, ~player~. It's not that bad, trust me...
Oh! I know what's happening now, and I like it!
Oh... it's that time...
This is starting to get embarrassing for you, ~player~…
Poor ~player~. He's so unlucky...
Chingada madre...
Is it embarrassing to take off something in front of girls? I could... try not to stare.
Is it hard for you to strip in front of girls, ~name~? I'll... try not to stare.
This'll be fun!
This is fun!
Let's go, ~name~!
You'll do better next time!
Don't worry, ~name~! You'll do better next time!
Oh boy! This is so much fun!
Keep it going, ~name~!
I'm liking this!
Yay! I'm liking this game!
Woo!
Ooh! Your turn, ~name~!
Don't mind me, ~name~.
(Do boys like ~name~ like... wider girls? These stockings aren't doing me any favors...)
Teach me about humans, ~name~...
I wanna learn everything about humans...
Yes!
Great!
Are you gonna... help me?
Look on the bright side, ~name~. You still have something on!
At least you're still playing, ~name~!
There's no need to be shy, ~player~! I don't bite.
You're kind of quiet, ~player~. Don't be shy, I don't bite!
(Aw, these demon girls, they always get angry over the littlest things!)
Ah! Is that...?
Ah! That thing behind you! Could that be a...?
A confession? I'm sure a pretty girl like you can't have a secret that embarrassing!
~name~! That's a pretty costu-
Are you gonna do that again? I don't think I-
It's this... the last time?
Monster Lord? How come I've never seen you at the hotel, Alice?
You remind me of Uncle Frank's wife, Beatrix!
I almost thought you were a relative of Uncle Frank's, Beatrix!
Ouch! Your poor butt must hurt with that on, Cammy!
Are you comfortable with your butt out there like that?
Oh, you're a witch! That explains why your cubes float! But what are they for?
Oh, Croix is a witch! That explains why those cubes float! But what is she gonna use them for?
Wow, you're bigger than any elf I've met, Erufuda... Wait! N-Not in that sense...
But wait. If you're already naked, how are you gonna strip?
But if you're already naked, Felicia, how are you gonna strip?
You're not gonna shave your head hair, are you?
Don't go for your head hair, Felicia. It's so pretty!
They say clowns are scary, but they aren't! Don't you agree, ~player~?
Why do people say clowns are scary? They aren't!
A were-cat? I haven't seen one in years!
You're a vampire too?
Marceline! You're a vampire too?
You don't feel tired from floating the whole time, Marcie?
You're gonna stay floating, Marcie? Not that I mind or anything...
You said men think you're a monster, Meia? I... I know how that feels.
~name~, is it true that succubi...?
~name~, do succubi really...?
So... how are you playing, ~name~?
We do have maids in the hotel. (But I wouldn't want one here with me right now...)
Oh my!
(She's talking to her clothes? Oh! They must be haunted!)
(She's talking to her clothes? Are they haunted?)
You came here to learn how to make friends, Saki? Don't worry, I don't know much about that either. We could learn together!
You don't know much about making friends? That's okay, Saki, I know very little about it too. But we can learn together, isn't that great?
Did I hear you correctly earlier, Saki? You said you were a zombie, right?
Just to be clear, you did say you were a zombie, right, Saki?
Number One? What a strange name for a human...
But wait... why do you need to use make-up? I-Is the human world not as accepting of zombies as I thought?
You hunt witches? You're not a monster hunter, are you?
♪♫I ain't afraid of no ghosts!♪♫
You're recording this, ~name~? (Will I even show up...?)
(Do I even appear on ~name~'s camera?)
Oh no!
A-Are all human girls this shy? S-sorry, ~name~...
I-Is it normal for humans to be this shy? Or am I scaring you?
Y-You go to a school, ~name~? H-How is it? I was home schooled...
S-so you go to a school, ~name~? I-Is it nice? I'm home-schooled...
Don't you think our styles match, ~name~?
Hey! Our styles match up! Don't you think so, ~name~?
I came here to learn about humans! Did you come for the same reason, ~name~?
Hey! I expected to play against humans, but it's great to see someone more like me!
You're looking pale, ~name~. As if you've seen a ghost... Or a vampire...
You're looking kind of pale, ~name~. Like you're scared... It's not me, is it?
You don't know much about the outside world, do you, ~name~? Don't worry, I don't either. Maybe we could learn together?
(Did Kyu just call me a... bitch?)
N-No, Zizou! I'm just a normal 118 year old girl!
Y-Yes, Zizou... (Why are you asking me that...?)
It may seem scary at first, but it's not that bad, ~name~.
Isn't this exciting, ~name~?
Don't you think this is exciting, ~name~?
Don't worry, ~name~. We'll all have to do it too.
There's always the next round!
Don't worry, ~name~. It's just one loss...
Is this how humans have fun? I could get used to games like this!
Show me how humans play, ~name~!
Now that I've stripped once, this just got more thrilling!
This game gets so much better once you strip, don't you think, ~name~?
Don't you think this game gets much more thrilling once we strip, ~name~?
Don't worry, ~name~. It gets way more exciting once you take something off!
Have you played this before, ~name~? I'm new to this...
This is my first time playing this, ~name~. Have you played before?
(I wonder what I'm gonna get for winning...)
Sorry, ~name~. Your turn!
I'd give you advice, ~name~, but I think I know even less than you...
What are you thinking about, ~name~?
We're all stripping at some point, ~name~, if that makes you feel any better...
You're not embarrassed by now, are you, ~name~?
Y-Your turn...
Heehee, ~name~, have fun!
Would you... show me more about humans, ~name~?
Peek-a-boo!
Booo! Sorry, ~name~, I just thought that was funny...
Booo! Heehee. Sorry, ~name~, it's a joke.
I'm afraid you lost, ~name~!
We got you!
